text: You go ask the cashier for a discount, but your voice cracks and the cashier cringes in disgust. You are kicked out of the soup shop and given a lifetime ban. You are filled with sorrow………Years have passed since that fateful day and even so you can’t let go. You are determined to wait as long as it takes to get back into the Soup Store's grace. Congratulations You Have Found The Banished Ending[New Game]
